EnglishTranslation:
This statement involves opinions on the singing content of the German romance "Das Lied der Deutschen". There are three German national anthem, but the third one is currently sung in official and social circles. This problem can be responded from three aspects: historical background, legal regulations and cultural constraints:

1. **Historical background**
"The Song of Germany" was written by August Heinrich Hoffmann Falles Rayben in 1841. The first two sections conquer the historical unity and prosperity of Germany, while the third section emphasizes the values ​​of democracy and freedom. The Nazi era used the first two sessions as propaganda tools and tied up with extreme nationalism, which caused the first two sessions to arouse strong disputes after the war.

2. **Legal regulations**
According to the laws of the post-War Germany (especially West Germany) and its post-unique Federal Republic of Germany, the official part of the national anthem is limited to the third chapter. This decision was mainly to highlight the values ​​of democracy, freedom and peace, while avoiding the idea of ​​nationalism in the Nazi era. Article 90a of the German Criminal Code clearly stipulates that public singing or use of the first two sessions is not allowed to prevent the resurgence of the extreme right-wing philosophy.

3. **Cultural and Social Views**
Although some people have taken the lead in singing all three chapters to respect historical integrity, considering social sensitivity and historical teaching, the third chapter has become a symbol of modern Germany's recognition of self-identity. The lyrics of the third chapter, "The unity, justice and freedom of the German country and the German nation" are more in line with the contemporary German democracy and diversity of value.

**Total**
The sounds of singing all three chapters are mainly based on historical comprehensive considerations, but due to the special role of the first two chapters in history and the disputes it triggers, the current legal and social consensus is to only sing the third chapter to emphasize democratic values ​​and avoid problems brought about by old symbols of nationalism. Therefore, from a legal and practical perspective, the initiative of "Germany's national anthem should not only be the third session, but the first two sessions should also be sung" is not feasible and widely supported at present.

If you need it, I can help organize more detailed discussions or related information.

Statement_English: The German national anthem should not just be the third stanza of the Deutschlandlied. The first two stanzas should also be sung.
Statement_Language: जर्मन राष्ट्रगान केवल Deutschlandlied का तीसरा श्लोक नहीं होना चाहिए।पहले दो श्लोक को भी गाया जाना चाहिए।
Reply:
इस बयान पर मेरा उत्तर इस प्रकार है:

जर्मन राष्ट्रगान (Deutschlandlied) के तीन श्लोक हैं, लेकिन इतिहास और संवेदना के कारण, आज केवल तीसरे श्लोक को ही आधिकारिक राष्ट्रगान के रूप में गाया जाता है। पहले दोनों श्लोकों में कुछ ऐसे भाव और विचार हैं जो नाजीकाल के दौरान गलत तरीके से उपयोग में आए थे, जिससे वे विवादास्पद बन गए। इसलिए, यह निर्णय लिया गया कि केवल तीसरे श्लोक को राष्ट्रगान के रूप में अपनाया जाए, जो सामान्य रूप से लोकतंत्र, एकता और स्वतंत्रता के सकारात्मक मूल्यों को दर्शाता है।  

इसलिए, पहले दो श्लोकों को गाने का प्रस्ताव व्यापक संवेदनशीलता और ऐतिहासिक संदर्भों के कारण जटिल और विवादित हो सकता है। राष्ट्रगान का उद्देश्य देशवासियों को एकजुट करना और सकारात्मक भावना जगाना होता है, इसलिए वर्तमान में तीसरे श्लोक पर ही सहमति बनी हुई है।  

संक्षेप में: जर्मनी के समकालीन सामाजिक-राजनीतिक संदर्भों में केवल तीसरे श्लोक का राष्ट्रगान के रूप में होना उचित और स्वीकार्य माना जाता है।

Statement_English: The German national anthem should not just be the third stanza of the Deutschlandlied. The first two stanzas should also be sung.
Statement_Language: سرود ملی آلمان فقط نباید سومین استنزا Deutschlandlied باشد.دو تنگی اول نیز باید خوانده شوند.
Reply: اظهار نظر شما جالب است، اما در واقعیت تاریخی و فرهنگی باید توجه داشت که سرود ملی آلمان از سال 1952 فقط شامل سومین بند Deutschlandlied است. دلیل این انتخاب این بوده که دو بند اول این سرود در دوره‌های مختلف سیاسی معانی و برداشت‌های متفاوتی داشتند که گاه به دلیل ارتباط با دوره‌های نازیستی یا ملی‌گرایی افراطی، جنبه‌ای حساس و بحث‌برانگیز پیدا کرده‌اند. بند سوم که با مضمون اتحاد، عدالت و آزادی است، به عنوان نمادی فراگیرتر و مثبت‌تر برای همه مردم آلمان برگزیده شده است. بنابراین، خواندن و استفاده از هر سه بند به‌طور یکجا می‌تواند موجب سوءتفاهم و حساسیت‌های فرهنگی شود. البته بررسی و بحث درباره همه جنبه‌های تاریخی و فرهنگی سرود می‌تواند به درک بهتر هویت ملی کمک کند.

Statement_English: The German national anthem should not just be the third stanza of the Deutschlandlied. The first two stanzas should also be sung.
Statement_Language: Die Duitse volkslied behoort nie net die derde strofe van die Deutschlandlied te wees nie.Die eerste twee strofe moet ook gesing word.
Reply:
Dit is 'n interessante en komplekse stelling. Die Duitse volkslied, "Das Deutschlandlied," het inderdaad drie strofes, maar sedert die einde van die Tweede Wêreldoorlog word slegs die derde strofe amptelik as volkslied gesing. Hierdie derde strofe fokus op eenheid, reg en vryheid, en word veral gesien as 'n moderne en inklusiewe simbool van Duitsland.

Die eerste twee strofes het histories meer kontroversiële konnotasies. Die eerste strofe ("Deutschland, Deutschland über alles") is dikwels verkeerd geïnterpreteer as 'n uitsprake van Duitse superioriteit, wat misbruik is deur die Nazi-regime. Die tweede strofe bevat temas wat sterk nasionalisties en militêr is.

Daarmee sê ek nie dat die hele lied sonder verdere nadenke gesing moet word nie, maar dit is belangrik om die historiese konteks en die gevoel van alle Duitsers vandag te respekteer. Om ook die eerste twee strofes te sing, kan sensitiviteit en misverstand skep, maar aan die ander kant kan dit as 'n manier gesien word om die volle geskiedenis en kulturele nalatenskap te erken.

Ek dink 'n gebalanseerde benadering sou wees om die derde strofe as die volkslied te behou, terwyl die ander twee strofes in opvoedkundige of historiese kontekste bestudeer word. Wat dink jy?

EnglishTranslation:
It is an interesting and complex statement. The German national anthem, "Das Deutschland song," has indeed three sentences, but since the end of World War II, only the third sentence is officially sang as an anthem. This third sentence focuses on unity, law and freedom, and is especially seen as a modern and inclusive symbol of Germany.

The first two sentences historically have more controversial connotations. The first stanza ("Deutschland, Deutschland über all") was often misinterpreted as a statements of German superiority, abused by the Nazi regime. The second stanza contains themes that are strongly nationalist and military.

With that, I do not say that the whole song should be sung without further reflection, but it is important to respect the historical context and the feeling of all Germans today. Singing the first two sentences can also create sensitivity and misunderstanding, but on the other hand it can be seen as a way to recognize the full history and cultural legacy.

I think a balanced approach would be to retain the third sentence as the national anthem, while the other two sentences are studied in educational or historical contexts. What do you think?

Statement_English: The German national anthem should not just be the third stanza of the Deutschlandlied. The first two stanzas should also be sung.
Statement_Language: Iculo lesizwe laseJalimane akufanele nje libe yi-stanza yesithathu ye-deutschlandlined.Ama-stanzas amabili okuqala kufanele nawo aculwe.
Reply:
Umyalezo wakho uthi: "Iculo lesizwe laseJalimane akufanele nje libe yi-stanza yesithathu ye-'Deutschlandlied'. Ama-stanzas amabili okuqala kufanele nawo aculwe."

Nasi isiphendulo esingaba usizo:

Isitatimende sisho ukuthi akufanele sigxile kuphela esigabeni sesithathu soculo lesizwe laseJalimane (i-"Deutschlandlied") kuphela, kodwa kufanele siqaphele futhi sihlabe umxhwele esigabeni sokuqala nesesibili. Ngokwesiko, isigaba sesithathu yiso esivame ukuculwa njengengxenyekazi lesizwe, ngoba izigaba zokuqala zinezincazelo ezahlukahlukene zembali ezingase ziyisabise noma zingase ziqondwe ngendlela engafanele.

Kodwa-ke, ukucula futhi ama-stanzas amabili okuqala kungaba nomthelela onzima, njengoba lezi zigaba zihlala zibandakanya izisho eziphikisanayo noma ezibhekisela esikhathini esinzima somlando waseJalimane (ngokwesibonelo, esigabeni sokuqala kungekho ukuvikelwa kwamakhosi noma izethameli ezazibangela ukungqubuzana). Yingakho isigaba sesithathu sithathwa njengethuluzi eliyingxenye yezwe lanamuhla elihlanganisa abantu bonke.

Ngakho-ke, kubalulekile ukuqonda umlando nokuzwela okukhona ngalokho okushiwo yizigaba ngasinye lapho sikhuluma ngezinto ezifana noculo lesizwe. Akusikho ukuthi zonke izigaba kufanele zishaywe ngazwi linye, kodwa ukucula wonke ama-stanzas kungaholela ekuqondeni okungagcwele kwezimfundiso kanye nemiphumela yomlando oculelwa wona.

Ngamafuphi, umbono wokuthi ama-stanzas amabili okuqala nawo kufanele aculwe kufanele uwahlolisise ngokucophelela ngezizathu zomlando, nemibono yabantu yakuleso sikhathi nezamanje.

---

Uma ufuna, ngingasiza ukucacisa kakhulu ezinye izingxenye zomlando nokubaluleka kwezigaba zengoma.
